Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45337 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.2.0-11, affected by CVE-2024-45337
